name: Shrine (itch) (sian fan)
description:
Shrine is made for playing on laptop or pc only. It does not work on Safari. Please use Chrome or Firefox. 

In search of digi-enlightenment... .

Shrine is an experimental art/game made in collaboration between Sian Fan X Ellie Niblock X Sizou Chen.

It guides you on a surreal virtual journey, seeking to incite an expanded state of consciousness, making you more receptive to the embodied experience of being online.
